messages.message:
Hey team,
https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/jeminjain
Crafting Sandbox seems to be stuck at launching since 27mins
Getting the below error.

Also deleting an earlier sandbox is still stuck in deleting stage.
https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/jeminjain1
Can someone help
Huh, let me check it out!
Hey @mfichman did you find something on this?
Looking now!
The 2nd one I just force-deleted, it's gone now
For the first one -- do you have any unsaved files in the sandbox? Going to try to update the base image to see if that fixes things.
Lmk if I should proceed!
You can proceed
:sonic-run:
Hmm, still getting stuck at customize system. Let me try to create another sandbox for comparison.

Cool, faced the same issue in the previous one, so i created a new one.
And got stuck on the new one
Sean recently updated the base image; it could be related to that. Let's see if this sandbox boots to rule that out. (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/mfichman-test)
Ah, it ran into the same problem
cc @sean.donohoe  -- think the new base image may be failing at the CustomizeSystem step -- maybe missing some CLI tools that crafting requires?
Unfortunately, there aren't any log messages, and the error is quite vague

Oof that’s not good, not sure what’s going on — would you guys mind pinning this sandbox for me to investigate in a bit, and update the ibdev-backend template’s base_snapshot back to instabase-dev while I debug?
Yeah sure
@sean.donohoe I'll ask the crafting folks as well!

Awesome, thank you so much Matt! :pray: I’ll be at my desk in ~30 minutes too to help — I suspect it’s likely related to some rc file not being written correctly, iirc that step should only be calling the script found at ‘platform/crafting/docker/sandbox.d/setup’ in the IB repo

Yeah, no worries -- I pushed a revert to the old template base image for now to unblock Jemin

```@@ -39,7 +45,7 @@ workspaces:
             - file: .sandbox/ibdev-backend/manifest-overrides.yaml
             - file: .sandbox/manifest-overrides.yaml
         disable_recursive_checkout: true
-    base_snapshot: <oci://519787998606.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/crafting/ibdev:0.1.0>
+    base_snapshot: instabase-dev
     probes:
       readiness:
         - name: control-plane```
@jemin.jain can you try creating a new sandbox from scratch? deleted your old one.
Yes sure
seeing this error
Ah, I didn't revert enough of the template. 1 sec.
OK, it's making progress again. Apologies!
ah right sorry, completely spaced that the environment variables would need to be added back :face_palm: thanks again for all the help @mfichman, I'm taking a look into the mfichman-test sandbox now!

aha, turns out I am even dumber than originally thought -- not sure what I was thinking, but this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/platform/crafting/docker/sandbox.d/setup#L28) is causing the setup script to early terminate with a non-zero exit code
Ohh huh I did run that script manually to see if it failed, but didn’t think to check the exit code
Haha yeah I’m working on a fix now, I’m making sure things are as verbose as possible too
<!subteam^S08AA13VAFQ> / @mfichman mind taking a look at this when y'all have a second? :pray: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/68421
One small q but fine by me, stamped lol
